A

ABBREVIATIONS - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
An abbreviations section usually lists all abbreviations and their meanings
ABSTRACT - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
An abstract usually contains the most vital aspects of a document in a concise manner
ACADEMICINTEGRITY - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
An academic integrity section is usually included to show that the author is aware of their work being of "good academic nature", which, among other things, means that all ideas that do not stem from the author have been marked as such and have been cited in an appropriate manner.
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
An acknowledgements section usually allows the author to acknowledgements other people and sources

Assessor - Class in frontend.ast.config
The assessor node contains properties for setting the name and role of the assessor It should always only use either name or first + lastname, but never both Role should never be supplied without having set up the name properly

The Assessor class represents an assessor of the user's document.

B

BIBLIOGRAPHY - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
A bibliography or works cited section usually lists all cited material
BLANKPAGE - Enum constant in enum class processing.StructureType
A blank page adds an empty page without any content, but is usually included in the page numeration
Book - Class in processing.work
A Book is a traditional type of work, which is usually referenced using its title, author(s), and publication details (usually the publisher and publication date).
Book(Author[], String, Publication) - Constructor for class processing.work.Book
 
BOOK - Enum constant in enum class processing.DocumentType
BOOK refers to any type of written book, such as a novel or non-fictional book, for example.
BOTTOM - Enum constant in enum class processing.NumerationPosition
The numbers are located in the bottom centre, using the style guide's margin to the bottom.
BOTTOM_LEFT - Enum constant in enum class processing.NumerationPosition
The numbers are located in the bottom left corner, using the style guide's margin to the left and bottom.
BOTTOM_RIGHT - Enum constant in enum class processing.NumerationPosition
The numbers are located in the bottom right corner, using the style guide's margin to the right and bottom.

Publication - Class in frontend.ast.config
The publication node represents the publication configuration
Publication - Class in processing
Specifies information about the publication of a work The most essential information are the publication name (for example, the name of the publisher of a book), the date (for example, the year it was published), the location (for example, in which country it has been published), and roles of other people than the author (for example, editors, directors, screenwriters, etc.)
